title.narrative: Sierra Leone Secondary Education Improvement Programme(SSEIP) Managing Agents

description.narrative: This activity ( Sierra Leone Secondary Education Improvement Programme(SSEIP) Managing Agents) is a component of Leh Wi Learn - Sierra Leone Secondary Education Improvement Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of goods' and a budget of £40,633,225. This component benefits Sierra Leone, and works in the following sector(s): Primary education, Secondary education. , with the following implementing partners: Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 01-06-2016 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
